definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide
character set (e.g. ASCII 美國資訊交換標準碼|美国资讯交换标准码 or Unicode 統一碼|统一码)

pinyin: guang1 xue2 zi4 fu2 shi2 bie2

sentences.english: Having data sets with a non-white space character separating the data points is a very common occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的就是数据集合不使用空格字符分隔数据点。

sentences.english: This field is blank padded and is not null terminated.
sentences.chinese: 该字段用空格填充，且不以空字符结尾。

sentences.english: The minimum number of alphanumeric characters in a password.
sentences.chinese: 密码中字母数字字符的最小数目。

sentences.english: This is a sentence or string phrase that has been encrypted.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个被加密的句子或字符串短语。

sentences.english: But this is perhaps a very simple example of ASCII art.
sentences.chinese: 这是字符艺术方面一个非常简单的例子。

sentences.english: We do some research on binarization of gray image and character segmentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了灰度文本图像二值化及字符分割。

sentences.english: It's used for objects such as string constants and classes.
sentences.chinese: 它用于诸如字符串常量和类之类的对象。

sentences.english: Select the address string and copy it to the clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 选择地址字符串并将其复制到剪贴板。

sentences.english: Customized multi-character marking on one single sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 在单个套管上根据客户要求定制多字符数码。

sentences.english: So these format strings we saw earlier.
sentences.chinese: 比如之前看到的格式化字符串。

sentences.english: It is printed using a MICR character font as shown above.
sentences.chinese: 这是印使用的MICR如上所示的字符字体。

sentences.english: Every post will have a random string as the unique key.
sentences.chinese: 每一个帖子将使用一个随机字符串作为惟一键。

sentences.english: This is a human-computer game players, a character interface, the entry-level.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个人机对战游戏，字符界面，入门级别。

sentences.english: Causes the next character to be outputted, to be output in lower case.
sentences.chinese: 使下一个被输出的字符输出为小写。

sentences.english: Moreover, it only matches user names of exactly eight characters.
sentences.chinese: 而且，它只匹配恰好八个字符的用户名。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-upper case character.
sentences.chinese: 前跟转义字符用于表示任意非大写字母的字符。

definition: blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
